title: Poisoned in Light
description: Magicks collide in the third and final installment of the M/M fantasy The Dragori Series by Bestselling Author Ben Alderson   Zacriah is imprisoned within the city of Lilioira which is firmly under the control of Gordex. Separated from Hadrian and his allies, he tries to deal with a darkness that grows within him. A new, deadly power. Heart Magick. The Druid will stop at nothing to retrieve the final Dragori to complete his ultimate plan of raising his kin once again. And all it takes is one failed rescue mission to set the wheels of doom in motion.  Time is not on the side of light.  War brews upon the horizon.
author: Ben Alderson
